name: The Great Dying-Prologue-XRP
description:
The Great Dying: Prologue 

Communication has been lost from the village near one of the Great Trese's now normally this is not a call for concern but with the recent activity of the orcs, you were tasked to check-in. You take the role of a seasoned mage equipped with your grimoire and green flame you set out with one Task and that's to Defend The Great Tree.

I plan on monetizing the app through ads with the ad revenue turned into ETh or other crypto and donated to 

https://rainforestfoundation.org

An organization dedicated to helping protect the rainforest and with the power of crypto, we can get funds to them quicker. In return, players will start earning Tokens built on the GodWoken Network.

HOW TO PLAY 

W-Move foward

A-Move left

S-Move Back

D-Move Right

Left Mouse Click- Shoot Fire-Consume a little bit of mana

Q- AOE ATTACk -Consume a lot of mana

OTHER GAMES

www.589challenge.com

A play-to-earn game now available on Android and IOS  currently rewarding XRPL tokens.
